documentation.text:
The vault shares mint calculation
a = amount
b = balance before mint 
t = total supply of shares
s = shares to mint 
s = at/b

The vault shares burn calculation
a = amount
b = balance before burn 
t = total supply of shares
s = shares to burn 
a = sb/t
